Grouped bar chart

Apr 2, 2016

Grouped bar chart

Result

Melting

The stucture of the original df:

  x  a  b
1 1 58 38
2 2 42 28
3 3 61 54
4 4 47 51
5 5 32 35
6 6 12 63
7 7 20 57

And the df.melted:

   x variable value
1  1        a    58
2  2        a    42
3  3        a    61
4  4        a    47
5  5        a    32
6  6        a    12
7  7        a    20
8  1        b    38
9  2        b    28
10 3        b    54
11 4        b    51
12 5        b    35
13 6        b    63
14 7        b    57

The structure have changed. Of course you don’t store data in a relational database in this manner, but it is necessary for this grouped plotting. reshape2’s melt function do this specifying the common variable (x in the example).
